altername_name: Cubix: Robots For Everyone - Race 'N Robots
name: Cubix: Robots for Everyone: Race 'n Robots
overview: Bubble Town's high-octane racing championships is about to start. Choose to race as Cubix or the other three robots as you compete against the most extreme robots. Cruise by the Bubble Town Botties Pit to upgrade your robot and unlock new characters to give you the chance to race as your Bubble Town friends. Your final goal is to out-race the competition and become the ultimate racing champion of Bubble Town.
